elementSpec.desc: marks the rhyming part of a metrical line.
segnala la stringa in rima all'interno di un verso
señala una parte del esquema rítmico de un verso

attDef.desc: provides a label to identify which part of a rhyme scheme this rhyming string instantiates.
fornisce un'etichetta che identifica quale parte dello schema rimico è rappresentata dalla stringa in questione
proporciona una etiqueta que identifica que parte del esquema rítmico representa la serie de caracteres en cuestión.
当該場所のラベルを示す．

remarks.p: Within a particular scope, all rhyme elements with the same value for their label attribute are assumed to rhyme with each other. The scope is defined by the nearest ancestor element for which the rhyme attribute has been supplied.

lg.l: With persons of no sort of education,
Or gentlemen, who, though well born and bred,
I don't choose to say much on this head,
I'm a plain man, and in a single station,
But — Oh! ye lords of ladies intellectual,
Inform us truly, have they not hen-peck'd you all?
